title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Sweet Caporal PSA 1
author: Buckswin07

posts.post_title: T206 Ty Cobb Green Sweet Caporal PSA 1
posts.post_content: An early grade Cobb that is jaw dropping for the grade.  DEEP color, razor focus, and crisp, straight edges.  No paper loss and minimal surface wrinkles.  Certainly worthy of a regrade.  $3k obo.  Feel free to text 414-339-0191 for additional info and pictures.  Speaking of which, they speak for themselves.  Thanks for the look :-)
Also open to a trade.  Send an offer or two...it's a very nice card!
I have a 1948 Leaf Ruth in a PSA 3 grade. Almost perfect centering all four ways. E-mail me at [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url] if interested in a trade for your cobb green in a PSA 1. Thanks,  Bill

[quote name="Frazier" post=1697441]I have a 1948 Leaf Ruth in a PSA 3 grade. Almost perfect centering all four ways. E-mail me at [url]billscheffel@yahoo.com[/url] if interested in a trade for your cobb green in a PSA 1. Thanks,  Bill[/QUOTE]

Appreciate it, but I'll pass on a straight up trade unless you had something else in mind.  Thank you.
